item.description:
Welcome in the summer at our June Meetup!



Please RSVP now.

The activity for this month is how to make ATC backgrounds. Martha and Pat will demonstrate a variety of paint techniques to create interesting backgrounds. We’ll be using acrylic paints and for one technique we'll use pottery clay (you'll have to show up to see this one).

We’ll have enough paper and paints for you to try each technique at least once.

SUPPLIES: If you think you might want to make more than the samples please bring some sheets of paper that will be heavy enough to use as ATC backgrounds.

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: June 2010 NE ATC+ Meetup in Needham
